intro: This graphic novel follows the adventures of a group of dinosaurs who find an island full of challenges and ancient secrets.
description:
In this exciting adventure, a group of dinosaurs led by the brave Rexy embark on a journey to discover the secrets of Jurassic Island, guided by an ancient map that promises legendary treasure.

Joined by the strategist Trini (Triceratops), the agile explorer Raptor (Velociraptor), the protector Stego (Stegosaurus) and the nervous but loyal Parry (Parasaurolophus), the team faces challenges that test their courage, ingenuity and unity.

·Easy game mode designed for children.

·Entertaining children's story with easy reading.

·Learn to read with fun stories in English.

·Cheerful ambient music and immersive sounds.

·Learn about Jurassic history and geography through an entertaining adventure.

·Educational content about dinosaurs with the recreation of natural places of great beauty.

·Adjust accessibility settings such as font height, sound volume, and image transition speed.
